00068 void motor_stuff () {
00069     //motor_catcher_stuff();
00070     //motor_revolver_stuff();
00071     motor_universal_stuff(&ss.mot_catcher);
00072     motor_universal_stuff(&ss.mot_revolver);
00073 }
00074 
00075 void motor_universal_stuff (stepper_motor *this) {
00076     if (this->status != stat_idle) {
00077         if (this->pause)    /* Count cycles/milliseconds for pause */
00078             this->pause--;
00079         else                /* If we are not in pause, we can count the milliseconds */
00080             this->cycle_counter++;
00081     }
00082 
00083     /* start and ramp up */
00084     if (this->status == stat_start_working) {
00085         /* if we just started to rotate, prepare ramp up */
00086         if (this->status_last != stat_start_working) {
00087             this->status_last = stat_start_working;
00088             this->ramp_steps = this->ramp_duration; /* will be decreased during ramp up */
00089             this->pause = this->pause_duration;
00090             this->steps_estimated = this->steps_estim_def;
00091             this->cycle_counter = 0;
00092             this->steps = 0;
00093         }
00094         
00095         /* do the ramp up */
00096         if ( (this->cycle_counter == (this->step_duration * this->ramp_steps) )
00097                 && !(this->pause) ) {
00098 //          this->enable();
00099             this->cycle_counter = 0;
00100             this->ramp_steps--;
00101             if (this->ramp_steps == 0) {
00102                 this->status = stat_working;
00103             }
00104             this->move_step();
00105             this->steps++;
00106         }
00107     }
00108     /* just rotate */
00109     if (this->status == stat_working) {
00110         if (this->status_last != stat_working) {
00111             this->status_last = stat_working;
00112             this->cycle_counter = 0;
00113         }
00114         if (this->cycle_counter == this->step_duration) {
00115             this->move_step();
00116             this->steps++;
00117             this->cycle_counter = 0;
00118 
00119             /* count the passes on the lightbarrier. One pass, one position */
00120             if (this->lb->passes > 0) {
00121                 this->lb->passes--;
00122                 this->steps = 0;
00123                 this->current_pos++;
00124                 if (this->current_pos == this->max_size)
00125                     this->current_pos = 0;
00126             }
00127         }
00128                 
00129         /* take care of if we are too far */
00130         if (this->current_pos == this->target_pos) {
00131             if (this->lb->is_blocked()) {
00132                 /* Do some more steps if we reached a difined position */
00133                 if (!this->steps_estimated)
00134                     this->status = stat_stop_working;
00135                 this->steps_estimated--;
00136             }
00137         }
00138     }
00139 
00140     /* pause down */
00141     if (this->status == stat_stop_working) {
00142         if (this->status_last == stat_working) {
00143             this->status_last = stat_stop_working;
00144             this->pause = this->pause_duration;
00145         }
00146         
00147         /* stop */
00148         if (!this->pause) { /* If pause is over */
00149             this->status = stat_finished;
00150         }
00151     }
00152     
00153     /* stop */
00154     if (this->status == stat_finished) {
00155         if (this->status_last == stat_stop_working) {
00156             this->status_last = stat_finished;
00157             this->cycle_counter = 0;
00158         }
00159         this->status = stat_idle;
00160 //      this->disable();
00161     }
00162 }

00170 void rotary_encoder_stuff() {
00171     if (IS_ROTENC_PUSH)
00172         ss.rotenc.pushtmp = ROTENC_PUSH;
00173 
00174     /* After button released, then count a single button press */
00175     if (ss.rotenc.pushtmp == ROTENC_PUSH && !IS_ROTENC_PUSH) {
00176         ss.rotenc.push++;
00177         ss.rotenc.pushtmp = ROTENC_NONE;
00178     }
00179 
00180     if (IS_ROTENC_NONE) {
00181         if (ss.rotenc.rottmp == ROTENC_A)
00182             ss.rotenc.left++;
00183 
00184         if (ss.rotenc.rottmp == ROTENC_B) // store current position
00185             ss.rotenc.right++;
00186 
00187         if (ss.rotenc.rottmp == ROTENC_BOTH) //choose myself
00188             ss.rotenc.right++;
00189 
00190         ss.rotenc.rottmp = ROTENC_NONE; //store current position
00191     }
00192     if (IS_ROTENC_AB) {
00193         if (ss.rotenc.rottmp == ROTENC_B)
00194             ss.rotenc.left++;
00195 
00196         if (ss.rotenc.rottmp == ROTENC_A) // store current position
00197             ss.rotenc.right++;
00198 
00199         if (ss.rotenc.rottmp == ROTENC_NONE) //choose myself
00200             ss.rotenc.right++;
00201 
00202         ss.rotenc.rottmp = ROTENC_BOTH;
00203     } else if (IS_ROTENC_A) {
00204         if (ss.rotenc.rottmp == ROTENC_BOTH)
00205             ss.rotenc.left++;
00206 
00207         if (ss.rotenc.rottmp == ROTENC_NONE) // store current position
00208             ss.rotenc.right++;
00209 
00210         if (ss.rotenc.rottmp == ROTENC_B) //choose myself
00211             ss.rotenc.right++;
00212 
00213         ss.rotenc.rottmp = ROTENC_A;
00214     } else if (IS_ROTENC_B) {
00215         if (ss.rotenc.rottmp == ROTENC_NONE)
00216             ss.rotenc.left++;
00217 
00218         if (ss.rotenc.rottmp == ROTENC_BOTH) // store current position
00219             ss.rotenc.right++;
00220 
00221         if (ss.rotenc.rottmp == ROTENC_A) //choose myself
00222             ss.rotenc.right++;
00223 
00224         ss.rotenc.rottmp = ROTENC_B;
00225     }
00226 }
00227 
00236 void lightbarrier_stuff ()
00237 {
00238     if (IS_LB_CATCHER) {
00239         /* recognize status changes from free to blocked */
00240         if (ss.lb_catcher.status_last == lb_free) {
00241             ss.lb_catcher.status_last = lb_blocked;
00242             ss.lb_catcher.status = lb_blocked;
00243         }
00244     }
00245     else {
00246         /* if status has changed fromm blocked to free, count a pass */
00247         if (ss.lb_catcher.status_last == lb_blocked) {
00248             ss.lb_catcher.status_last = lb_free;
00249             ss.lb_catcher.status = lb_free;
00250             ss.lb_catcher.passes++;
00251         }
00252     }
00253 
00254     if (IS_LB_REVOLVER) {
00255         /* recognize status changes from free to blocked */
00256         if (ss.lb_revolver.status_last == lb_free) {
00257             ss.lb_revolver.status_last = lb_blocked;
00258             ss.lb_revolver.status = lb_blocked;
00259         }
00260     }
00261     else {
00262         /* if status has changed fromm blocked to free, count a pass */
00263         if (ss.lb_revolver.status_last == lb_blocked) {
00264             ss.lb_revolver.status_last = lb_free;
00265             ss.lb_revolver.status = lb_free;
00266             ss.lb_revolver.passes++;
00267         }
00268     }
00269 }

00283 void sensor_tcs_stuff() {
00284     uint8_t y;
00285     static uint16_t f_blu, f_gre, f_red;
00286     
00287 #if DISTANCE_DETECTION
00288     double col_dis_blu [col_unknown] = { 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000. };
00289     double col_dis_gre [col_unknown] = { 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000. };
00290     double col_dis_red [col_unknown] = { 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000. };
00291     double  col_dis_all [col_unknown] = { 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000. };
00292     double  minimum = 1000.;
00293     smartie_color probably = col_unknown;
00294 #endif
00295 #if DISTANCE_NORM_DETECTION
00296     double col_dis_blu [col_unknown] = { 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000. };
00297     double col_dis_gre [col_unknown] = { 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000. };
00298     double col_dis_red [col_unknown] = { 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000. };
00299     double col_dis_all [col_unknown] = { 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000., 1000. };
00300     double minimum = 1000.;
00301     smartie_color probably = col_unknown;
00302 #endif
00303     
00304     if (ss.sens_tcs.status == stat_start_working) {
00305         if (ss.sens_tcs.status_last == stat_idle) {
00306             ss.sens_tcs.status = stat_working;
00307             ss.sens_tcs.status_last = stat_start_working;
00308             COL_SENS_TCS_ENABLE;
00309             COL_SENS_TCS_SET_FILTER(col_unknown);
00310             COL_SENS_TCS_FREQ_MESURE_EN;
00311             ss.sens_tcs.time = 0;
00312             ss.sens_tcs.slopes = 0;
00313             ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_blue = 0;
00314             ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_green = 0;
00315             ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_red = 0;
00316             ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_none = 0;
00317         }
00318     }
00319 
00320     if (ss.sens_tcs.status == stat_working) {
00321         ss.sens_tcs.time++;
00322         if (ss.sens_tcs.status_last == stat_start_working) {
00323             ss.sens_tcs.status_last = stat_working;
00324             COL_SENS_TCS_SET_FILTER(col_blue);
00325         }
00326 
00327         if (ss.sens_tcs.time == COL_SENS_TCS_SAMPLE_TIME) {
00328             if (ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_blue == 0) {
00329                 ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_blue = ss.sens_tcs.slopes / COL_SENS_TCS_SAMPLE_TIME ;
00330                 COL_SENS_TCS_SET_FILTER(col_green);
00331                 ss.sens_tcs.time = 0;
00332                 ss.sens_tcs.slopes = 0;
00333             }
00334             else if (ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_green == 0) {
00335                 ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_green = ss.sens_tcs.slopes / COL_SENS_TCS_SAMPLE_TIME;
00336                 COL_SENS_TCS_SET_FILTER(col_red);
00337                 ss.sens_tcs.time = 0;
00338                 ss.sens_tcs.slopes = 0;
00339             }
00340             else if (ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_red == 0) {
00341                 ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_red = ss.sens_tcs.slopes / COL_SENS_TCS_SAMPLE_TIME;
00342                 COL_SENS_TCS_SET_FILTER(col_unknown);
00343                 ss.sens_tcs.time = 0;
00344                 ss.sens_tcs.slopes = 0;
00345             }
00346             else if (ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_none == 0) {
00347                 ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_none = ss.sens_tcs.slopes / COL_SENS_TCS_SAMPLE_TIME;
00348                 ss.sens_tcs.status = stat_stop_working;
00349             }
00350         }
00351     }
00352     
00353     if (ss.sens_tcs.status == stat_stop_working) {
00354         if (ss.sens_tcs.status_last == stat_working) {
00355             ss.sens_tcs.status_last = stat_stop_working;
00356             COL_SENS_TCS_FREQ_MESURE_DI;
00357             COL_SENS_TCS_DISABLE;
00358             f_blu = ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_blue;
00359             f_gre = ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_green;
00360             f_red = ss.sens_tcs.filter_freq_red;
00361         }
00362         /* Now detect colors */
00363 #if DISTANCE_NORM_DETECTION
00364         for (y=0; y<=col_unknown; y++) {
00365             col_dis_blu[y] = (col_ava_blu[y] / f_blu );
00366             col_dis_gre[y] = (col_ava_gre[y] / f_gre);
00367             col_dis_red[y] = (col_ava_red[y] / f_red);
00368             col_dis_all[y] = sqrt ( (col_dis_blu[y])*(col_dis_blu[y]) + (col_dis_gre[y])*(col_dis_gre[y]) + (col_dis_red[y])*(col_dis_red[y]));
00369             if (minimum >= col_dis_all[y]) {
00370                 minimum = col_dis_all[y];
00371                 probably = y;
00372                 ss.sens_tcs.distance = (int16_t)minimum;
00373             }
00374         }
00375 
00376         if (minimum < 6.)
00377             ss.sens_tcs.color = probably;
00378         else
00379             ss.sens_tcs.color = col_unknown;
00380 
00381 #endif
00382         
00383 #if DISTANCE_DETECTION
00384         for (y=0; y<=col_unknown; y++) {
00385             col_dis_blu[y] = fabs (col_ava_blu[y] - f_blu);
00386             col_dis_gre[y] = fabs (col_ava_gre[y] - f_gre);
00387             col_dis_red[y] = fabs (col_ava_red[y] - f_red);
00388             col_dis_all[y] = sqrt ( (col_dis_blu[y])*(col_dis_blu[y]) + (col_dis_gre[y])*(col_dis_gre[y]) + (col_dis_red[y])*(col_dis_red[y]));
00389             if (minimum >= col_dis_all[y]) {
00390                 minimum = col_dis_all[y];
00391                 probably = y;
00392                 ss.sens_tcs.distance = (int16_t)minimum;
00393             }
00394         }
00395 
00396         if (minimum <= 6)
00397             ss.sens_tcs.color = probably;
00398         else
00399             ss.sens_tcs.color = col_unknown;
00400 
00401 #endif
00402 #if TABLE_REFERENCE_DETECTION
00403         for (y=0; y<=col_unknown; y++) {
00404             if ( ((f_blu >= col_tab_blu[y][0]) && (f_blu <= col_tab_blu[y][1])) && 
00405                     ((f_gre >= col_tab_gre[y][0]) && (f_gre <= col_tab_gre[y][1])) &&
00406                     ((f_red >= col_tab_red[y][0]) && (f_red <= col_tab_red[y][1])) ) {
00407                 break;
00408             }
00409         }
00410         ss.sens_tcs.color = y;
00411 #endif
00412         ss.sens_tcs.status = stat_finished;
00413     }
00414     
00415     if (ss.sens_tcs.status == stat_finished) {
00416         ss.sens_tcs.status = stat_idle;
00417         ss.sens_tcs.status_last = stat_finished;
00418     }
00419 }

00428 void vibrator_stuff () {
00429     if (ss.vibr.status == stat_start_working) {
00430         if (ss.vibr.status_last != stat_start_working) {
00431             ss.vibr.status_last = stat_start_working; 
00432             ss.vibr.status = stat_working;
00433             ss.vibr.duration = VIBR_DURATION;
00434             VIBR_ON;
00435         }
00436     }
00437     
00438     if (ss.vibr.status == stat_working) {
00439         if (ss.vibr.status_last != stat_working)
00440             ss.vibr.status_last = stat_working;
00441         
00442         ss.vibr.duration--;
00443         if (ss.vibr.duration == 0) {
00444             ss.vibr.status = stat_stop_working;
00445         }
00446     }
00447     
00448     if (ss.vibr.status == stat_stop_working) {
00449         if (ss.vibr.status_last != stat_stop_working)
00450             ss.vibr.status_last = stat_stop_working;
00451         VIBR_OFF;
00452         ss.vibr.status = stat_finished;
00453     }
00454     
00455     if (ss.vibr.status == stat_finished) {
00456         if (ss.vibr.status_last != stat_finished)
00457             ss.vibr.status_last = stat_finished;
00458         ss.vibr.status = stat_idle;
00459     }
00460 }
